items.sentence: Tom and Mary are good friends, but they aren\'t dating.
Tom won\'t give Mary the message that you asked him to.
There must be a way we can convince Tom to work for us.
This stew tastes a lot better than the way I make stew.
Tom didn\'t allow his daughter Mary to go to the party.
Tom didn\'t ask whether Mary was planning to go or not.
Tom didn\'t even know how to say "thank you" in French.
I want to know more about the accident that killed Tom.
I was the one who convinced Tom not to do that anymore.
I don\'t want to bother you guys while you\'re working.
